https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/2JVkmhEsmkmZKSO8Im72K2q7BJV.jpg In a small town, a demonic form of the Easter Bunny murders everyone in its path. The residents realize that they must destroy the creature before it completes its 'Easter Holocaust' and brings about the apocalypse. Easter Holocaust
